original_title: 偶然の密室 人妻ホテル受付係と出張サラリーマン 夏目彩春
overview: Ayaharu, a married woman who works as a receptionist at a business hotel. One day she was summoned by a guest office worker, Odagiri, and when she went to her room, she was suddenly accused and pulled into the closet. The moment she desperately resisted and tried to escape, the golf bag placed outside collapsed and the two were trapped inside. There is no hope that help will come until the next day's cleaning staff arrives ... In such despair, Odagiri is lustful for the beautiful Ayaharu who sweats her in front of her.
title: A Coincidental Meeting A Married Woman Hotel Receptionist And A Business Man On A Business Trip Iroha Natsume
